title: Question about inhibitor turrets
body: Could anyone please let me know how a cho'gath can be hitting the inhibitor turrets for 100 magic damage and 87 melee damage and then all of a sudden, while still attacking, hit the turret for 33 magic damage and 29 melee damage?

replies.body: While minions are nearby enemy turrets, those turrets lose some of their defensive resistances; once those minions are killed, those resistances are restored. Could this be what you saw?
